es.ull.isaatc.simulation.parallel.flow
Class ProbabilitySelectionFlow

java.lang.Object
  es.ull.isaatc.simulation.parallel.SimulationObject
      es.ull.isaatc.simulation.parallel.flow.BasicFlow
          es.ull.isaatc.simulation.parallel.flow.MultipleSuccessorFlow
              es.ull.isaatc.simulation.parallel.flow.ProbabilitySelectionFlow
All Implemented Interfaces:
Flow, InitializerFlow, MultipleSuccessorFlow, ProbabilitySelectionFlow, SplitFlow, Identifiable, SimulationObject, java.lang.Comparable<SimulationObject>
public class ProbabilitySelectionFlow
extends MultipleSuccessorFlow
implements ProbabilitySelectionFlow

A flow which selects one outgoing branch among a set of them by using a probability value. Each outgoing branch has a value (0.0 - 1.0] expressing the probability of being chosen of such branch.

Author:
Iván Castilla Rodríguez

Field Detail

probabilities

protected final java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Double> probabilities
List of probabilities associated to each outgoing branch

sum

protected double sum
The sum total of all the outgoing branches. This value should be 1.0, but it's explicitly declared to avoid misdefinitions.

link

public void link(Flow successor)
Adds a probabilistic flow's successor. A probability of 1.0 is associated to this successor

link

public void link(java.util.Collection<Flow> succList,
                 java.util.Collection<java.lang.Double> probList)
Adds a collection of probabilistic flow's successor. Size of succList and probList must agree.

Specified by:
link in interface ProbabilitySelectionFlow
Parameters:
succList - This flow's successors
probList - The probability of these successors of being chosen

link

public void link(java.util.Collection<Flow> succList)
Adds a collection of probabilistic flow's successor. The same probability is assigned to each successor.
